articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Fortnite on Nintendo Switch gets boosted resolution, better frame rate - Polygon
articles.description: Fortnite developer Epic Games updated Fortnite on Nintendo Switch on March 30 to improve the game’s GPU performance and resolution. Plus, dinosaurs.
articles.content: Yes, Fortnite has dinosaurs now, but developer Epic Games also made some other changes. Specifically, Fortnite for Nintendo Switch received an update Tuesday that improves performance to make better … [+1286 chars]
